scripts.deploy: echo 'Write deployment after you figure it out'
scripts.clear-watch: echo 256 | sudo tee -a /proc/sys/fs/inotify/max_user_instances && echo 32768 | sudo tee -a /proc/sys/fs/inotify/max_queued_events && echo 65536 | sudo tee -a /proc/sys/fs/inotify/max_user_watches && watchman shutdown-server
